products.productdescription:
This 25mm coral orange venetian blind adds a saturated shade of orange to your room.  Our venetian blinds are fantastic for privacy and light control, with the angled slats providing natural UV protection. 25mm Venetian blinds also offer a slim in profile - perfect for tricky windows and doors where space-saving is important.As with all our made to measure products, this metal venetian blinds comes with a five year guarantee and customer-first service.  Made in the heart of Yorkshire, at Swift Direct Blinds our venetian blinds are made bespoke to your measurements by a team of experts.

products.title: Premier 35mm Grained White Faux Wood
products.metadescription: Premier 35mm Grained White Faux Wood in White. Made to measure from £9.88 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Faux Wood includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling 35mm Premier Faux Wood range are made from high-quality flame-retardant PVC slats, and this bright, embossed white faux wood easily brightens the room. 
 
A perfect addition to rooms that need optimum light and privacy control, our faux wooden blinds are great for kitchens and bathrooms, with easy-care wipe-clean slats and a clean tailored finish, these blinds are a firm favourite with our customers. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for homes up and down the country. This white faux wood blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
